variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v1
variable.description: 1. In uncertain times I expect the best. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v2
variable.description: 2. If something can go wrong for me, it will. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v3
variable.description: 3. I am always optimistic about my future. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v4
variable.description: 4. I hardly ever expect things to go my way. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v5
variable.description: 5. I rarely count on good things happening to me. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v6
variable.description: 6. Overall, I expect more good things to happen than bad. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v7
variable.description: 7. Please tell me which of the following best describes your employment status? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v8
variable.description: 8. Have you worked for pay in the past? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v9
variable.description: 9. How satisfied (are/were) you with your job? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v10
variable.description: 10. During the past year, how often were you in a situation where you faced job loss or layoff? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]
variable.value: Constantly faced with job loss or lay off
Faced this possibility more than once
Never faced with job loss or lay off

variable.name: AF2v11
variable.description: 11. Sometimes people have jobs that they want to keep. When thinking about your job (now/when you were working) [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]
variable.value: You don't care to keep your job

variable.name: AF2v12
variable.description: 12. If you were to lose your main job, what do you think your chances (would be/would have been) of finding another job that paid about the same? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v13
variable.description: 13. I (have/had) very little chance to decide how I do my work. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v14
variable.description: 14. My work (requires/required) working very fast. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v15
variable.description: 15. My work (requires/required) a lot of physical effort. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v16
variable.description: 16. I (have/had) enough time to get my work done. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v17
variable.description: 17. I (get/got) to do a variety of different things. [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v18
variable.description: 18. At your workplace, (do/did) you participate in making decisions about such things as the products or services offered? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v19a
variable.description: 19a. As an official part of your job, (do/did) you supervise work of other employees, have responsibility for or tell other employees what work to do? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v19b
variable.description: 19b. (Do/Did) you hold a managerial position at your place of employment? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v19c
variable.description: 19c. Would that (be/have been) a top, upper, middle or lower managerial position? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v20
variable.description: 20. (Does/Did) someone else supervise your work? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v21
variable.description: 21. (Is/Was) your immediate supervisor Black, White, or of another ethnicity or race? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v22
variable.description: 22. Do you think your job (is/was) one that Black people tend to get more than people of other ethnic groups? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]

variable.name: AF2v23
variable.description: 23. (Is/Was) your work group all Black, mostly Black, about half Black and half White, mostly White, or all White? [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]
variable.value: About half Black and half White

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: FORM VERSION [Visit 3] [Second Year Questionnaire, AF2]
